---
Prompt text including placeholders [TARGETLANGUAGE], [PROMPT], [VARIABLE1], [VARIABLE2] and [VARIABLE3] replaced automagically by AIPRM.

[VARIABLE1], [VARIABLE2] and [VARIABLE3] require title with optional default value and available values.

Example: Example [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE] with [VARIABLE1], [VARIABLE2] and [VARIABLE3].
[VARIABLE1:Title] [VARIABLE2:Title:Default Value] [VARIABLE3:Title:Default Value:Available Value 1|Available Value 2|Available Value 3].

[VARIABLE1], [VARIABLE2] and [VARIABLE3] will be pre-filled using URL parameters AIPRM_VARIABLE1, AIPRM_VARIABLE2 and AIPRM_VARIABLE3.
PromptHint: [KEYWORD] or [your list of keywords, maximum ca. 8000]
